name: Assembly Front
description:
This Game is a prototype, I will probably never update it due to lack of motivation.

Big SHOUTOUT to SJ MOON for the music!

https://soundcloud.com/s-j-moon

I Recommend downloading the game to get better performance

How to play:

click on "troops" then click on "miner", then click on anywhere behind your bases line to spawn them

to send troops to battle or miners to mine, you must click on "troops" then click on "attack", every time you spawn a new troop you must click on "attack" again to send them

destroy the enemy base while trying to defend your own!
